data.title: THE MOTH (Ger)
data.meta_description:
THE MOTH (Ger).
Hamburg, Germany.
Hailing from Hamburg (Ger) The Moth are a three-piece with a heavy, no nonsense approach to sludge-metal/doom.
Their songs are virtually void of frills, instead opting to turn out hammer heavy drums and riff ready rock ’n’ roll. As brutal as it is bewitching. THE MOTH is signed to EXILE ON MAINSTREAM RECORDS
data.text:
Hailing from Hamburg (Ger) The Moth are a three-piece with a heavy, no nonsense approach to sludge- metal/doom.

Their songs are virtually void of frills, instead opting to turn out hammer heavy drums and riff ready rock ’n’ roll. As brutal as it is bewitching. THE MOTH is signed to EXILE ON MAINSTREAM RECORDS ... more
